001package wavelet;
002
003public class DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation extends DiscreteWaveletTransformation {
004  protected double[][] sourceCoefficients;
005  
006  protected double[][] scalingCoefficients;
007  
008  protected double[][][] waveletCoefficients;
009  
010  protected double[][] recomposedCoefficients;
011  
012  public DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation(double[][] paramArrayOfdouble) {
013    sourceCoefficients(paramArrayOfdouble);
014  }
015  
016  public DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation(double[][] paramArrayOfdouble, double[][][] paramArrayOfdouble1) {
017    scalingCoefficients(paramArrayOfdouble);
018    waveletCoefficients(paramArrayOfdouble1);
019  }
020  
021  protected void initialize() {
022    super.initialize();
023    this.sourceCoefficients = null;
024    this.scalingCoefficients = null;
025    this.waveletCoefficients = null;
026    this.recomposedCoefficients = null;
027  }
028  
029  public double[][] recomposedCoefficients() {
030    if (this.recomposedCoefficients == null)
031      computeRecomposedCoefficients(); 
032    return this.recomposedCoefficients;
033  }
034  
035  public double[][] scalingCoefficients() {
036    if (this.scalingCoefficients == null)
037      computeScalingAndWaveletCoefficients(); 
038    return this.scalingCoefficients;
039  }
040  
041  public void scalingCoefficients(double[][] paramArrayOfdouble) {
042    this.scalingCoefficients = paramArrayOfdouble;
043    this.recomposedCoefficients = null;
044  }
045  
046  public double[][] sourceCoefficients() {
047    return this.sourceCoefficients;
048  }
049  
050  public void sourceCoefficients(double[][] paramArrayOfdouble) {
051    this.sourceCoefficients = paramArrayOfdouble;
052    this.scalingCoefficients = null;
053    this.recomposedCoefficients = null;
054  }
055  
056  public double[][][] waveletCoefficients() {
057    if (this.waveletCoefficients == null)
058      computeScalingAndWaveletCoefficients(); 
059    return this.waveletCoefficients;
060  }
061  
062  public void waveletCoefficients(double[][][] paramArrayOfdouble) {
063    this.waveletCoefficients = paramArrayOfdouble;
064    this.recomposedCoefficients = null;
065  }
066  
067  public double[][] diagonalWaveletCoefficients() {
068    return waveletCoefficients()[2];
069  }
070  
071  public double[][] horizontalWaveletCoefficients() {
072    return waveletCoefficients()[0];
073  }
074  
075  public double[][] verticalWaveletCoefficients() {
076    return waveletCoefficients()[1];
077  }
078  
079  public WaveletTransformation applyTo(Object paramObject) {
080    if (!(paramObject instanceof double[][]))
081      throw new IllegalArgumentException("anObject must be a double[][]."); 
082    sourceCoefficients((double[][])paramObject);
083    scalingCoefficients();
084    waveletCoefficients();
085    return this;
086  }
087  
088  public WaveletTransformation transform(WaveletTransformation paramWaveletTransformation) {
089    if (!(paramWaveletTransformation instanceof DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation))
090      throw new IllegalArgumentException("waveletTransformation must be a DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation."); 
091    DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation discreteWavelet2dTransformation = (DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation)paramWaveletTransformation;
092    double[][] arrayOfDouble = discreteWavelet2dTransformation.sourceCoefficients();
093    if (arrayOfDouble == null)
094      arrayOfDouble = discreteWavelet2dTransformation.recomposedCoefficients(); 
095    return new DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation(arrayOfDouble);
096  }
097  
098  protected void computeRecomposedCoefficients() {
099    if (this.scalingCoefficients == null)
100      return; 
101    if (this.waveletCoefficients == null)
102      return; 
103    int i = rowSize(this.scalingCoefficients);
104    int j = i * 2;
105    int k = columnSize(this.scalingCoefficients);
106    int m = k * 2;
107    double[][] arrayOfDouble1 = transpose(this.scalingCoefficients);
108    double[][] arrayOfDouble2 = transpose(horizontalWaveletCoefficients());
109    double[][] arrayOfDouble3 = transpose(verticalWaveletCoefficients());
110    double[][] arrayOfDouble4 = transpose(diagonalWaveletCoefficients());
111    double[][] arrayOfDouble5 = new double[k][j];
112    double[][] arrayOfDouble6 = new double[k][j];
113    for (Integer b1 = 0; b1 < k; b1++) {
114      DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation discreteWavelet1dTransformation = new DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation(atRow(arrayOfDouble1, b1), atRow(arrayOfDouble2, b1));
115      atRowPut(arrayOfDouble5, b1, discreteWavelet1dTransformation.recomposedCoefficients());
116      discreteWavelet1dTransformation = new DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation(atRow(arrayOfDouble3, b1), atRow(arrayOfDouble4, b1));
117      atRowPut(arrayOfDouble6, b1, discreteWavelet1dTransformation.recomposedCoefficients());
118    } 
119    arrayOfDouble5 = transpose(arrayOfDouble5);
120    arrayOfDouble6 = transpose(arrayOfDouble6);
121    double[][] arrayOfDouble7 = new double[j][m];
122    for (Integer b2 = 0; b2 < j; b2++) {
123      DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation discreteWavelet1dTransformation = new DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation(atRow(arrayOfDouble5, b2), atRow(arrayOfDouble6, b2));
124      atRowPut(arrayOfDouble7, b2, discreteWavelet1dTransformation.recomposedCoefficients());
125    } 
126    this.recomposedCoefficients = arrayOfDouble7;
127  }
128  
129  protected void computeScalingAndWaveletCoefficients() {
130    if (this.sourceCoefficients == null)
131      return; 
132    int i = rowSize(this.sourceCoefficients);
133    int j = i / 2;
134    int k = columnSize(this.sourceCoefficients);
135    int m = k / 2;
136    double[][] arrayOfDouble1 = new double[i][m];
137    double[][] arrayOfDouble2 = new double[i][m];
138    for (Integer b1 = 0; b1 < i; b1++) {
139      DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation discreteWavelet1dTransformation = new DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation(atRow(this.sourceCoefficients, b1));
140      atRowPut(arrayOfDouble1, b1, discreteWavelet1dTransformation.scalingCoefficients());
141      atRowPut(arrayOfDouble2, b1, discreteWavelet1dTransformation.waveletCoefficients());
142    } 
143    arrayOfDouble1 = transpose(arrayOfDouble1);
144    arrayOfDouble2 = transpose(arrayOfDouble2);
145    double[][] arrayOfDouble3 = new double[m][j];
146    double[][] arrayOfDouble4 = new double[m][j];
147    double[][] arrayOfDouble5 = new double[m][j];
148    double[][] arrayOfDouble6 = new double[m][j];
149    for (Integer b2 = 0; b2 < m; b2++) {
150      DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation discreteWavelet1dTransformation = new DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation(atRow(arrayOfDouble1, b2));
151      atRowPut(arrayOfDouble3, b2, discreteWavelet1dTransformation.scalingCoefficients());
152      atRowPut(arrayOfDouble4, b2, discreteWavelet1dTransformation.waveletCoefficients());
153      discreteWavelet1dTransformation = new DiscreteWavelet1dTransformation(atRow(arrayOfDouble2, b2));
154      atRowPut(arrayOfDouble5, b2, discreteWavelet1dTransformation.scalingCoefficients());
155      atRowPut(arrayOfDouble6, b2, discreteWavelet1dTransformation.waveletCoefficients());
156    } 
157    arrayOfDouble3 = transpose(arrayOfDouble3);
158    arrayOfDouble4 = transpose(arrayOfDouble4);
159    arrayOfDouble5 = transpose(arrayOfDouble5);
160    arrayOfDouble6 = transpose(arrayOfDouble6);
161    this.scalingCoefficients = arrayOfDouble3;
162    this.waveletCoefficients = new double[][][] { arrayOfDouble4, arrayOfDouble5, arrayOfDouble6 };
163  }
164  
165  private double[] atRow(double[][] paramArrayOfdouble, int paramInt) {
166    return paramArrayOfdouble[paramInt];
167  }
168  
169  private void atRowPut(double[][] paramArrayOfdouble, int paramInt, double[] paramArrayOfdouble1) {
170    for (Integer b = 0; b < (paramArrayOfdouble[paramInt]).length; b++)
171      paramArrayOfdouble[paramInt][b] = paramArrayOfdouble1[b]; 
172  }
173  
174  private int columnSize(double[][] paramArrayOfdouble) {
175    return (paramArrayOfdouble[0]).length;
176  }
177  
178  private int rowSize(double[][] paramArrayOfdouble) {
179    return paramArrayOfdouble.length;
180  }
181  
182  private double[][] transpose(double[][] paramArrayOfdouble) {
183    int i = rowSize(paramArrayOfdouble);
184    int j = columnSize(paramArrayOfdouble);
185    double[][] arrayOfDouble = new double[j][i];
186    for (Integer b = 0; b < paramArrayOfdouble.length; b++) {
187      for (Integer b1 = 0; b1 < (paramArrayOfdouble[b]).length; b1++)
188        arrayOfDouble[b1][b] = paramArrayOfdouble[b][b1]; 
189    } 
190    return arrayOfDouble;
191  }
192}
